body_html: @alykhantejani @martinarjovsky I want to start contributing. I have installed pytorch in develop mode and was intending to solve this issue. This may seem dumb but I dont know where do we add functions like max, min, arrange, ones_like, zeros_like. From the above pull request #2489 I saw that the new functions have been added to THCTensorMath.c. Do we need to write the code in C? or is there a python file where we add new functions?

body: @alykhantejani @martinarjovsky I want to start contributing. I have installed pytorch in develop mode and was intending to solve this issue. This may seem dumb but I dont know where do we add functions like max, min, arrange, ones_like, zeros_like. From the above pull request #2489 I saw that the new functions have been added to THCTensorMath.c. Do we need to write the code in C? or is there a python file where we add new functions?
